title: "muh skillshots!" - Ezreal mains
body:
http://i.imgur.com/nieKqX2.png

1150 range poke *check*
1000 range AoE poke *check*
Flash every 5-10 seconds *check*
Mixed damage *check*
Global ultimate *check*
Can be both AD and AP *check*
low cooldowns *check*
attack speed steroid *check*
Potential 1500 damage ultimate to multiple targets every 30 seconds *check*

Gut the Freelo Explorer
